name: react-easy-universal
description: Universal Routing & Rendering with React & Redux was too hard. Now it's easy.

scripts.clean: rimraf dist && rimraf build && mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p dist/client && mkdir -p build && mkdir -p build/static && cp source/test/fixtures/index.html ./build/index.html
scripts.prestart:client-tests: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:test
scripts.test: npm run -s test:unit && npm run -s test:e2e
scripts.build:test-client: browserify -d source/test/fixtures/client.js -o build/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.build:test: browserify -d source/test/client/index.js -o build/static/browser-tests.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] && cp build/static/browser-tests.js build/.
scripts.build:server: babel -s -d dist/server source/server && babel -s -d dist/shared source/shared
scripts.build: npm run -s clean && npm run -s build:client && npm run -s build:test-client && npm run -s build:test && npm run -s build:warn && npm run -s build:server
scripts.watch: watch "clear && npm run lint -s && npm run test -s" source
scripts.watch:client: watch "clear && npm run lint -s && npm run -s build:test && npm run -s test" source
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test && npm outdated --depth=0

author: Eric Elliott
